'Hmmm...'%K%P
I was sitting on the bench on the veranda and\nthinking things over.%K%P
Lately, I'd been feeling different.%K%P
'Sho...'%K%P
He's a nosy, sweet guy. He worries himself stupid\nover me, and is always so thoughtful.%K%P
And I find myself thinking about him in every\nspare moment.%K%P
Whenever I see his face, my heart skips a beat.%K%P
I've never felt this way before.%K%P
'What is this feeling?'%K%P
Friendship?%K%P
It was like that, but something felt different.%K%P
'...I think it might be...THAT.'%K%P
Yeah, I definitely just wanted to show him up!%K%P
So of course I was thinking about him all the time.%K%P
'Okay, let's get to work!'%K%P
I got pumped up thinking about how\nI could totally own him.%K%P
Recently, with her new found new enthusiasm,\nAkane had started working really hard.%K%P
She started hitting the books, and helping out more\nwith housework.%K%P
'Akane, are you done over there?'%K%P
'Um, almost... Okay, all finished!'%K%P
'Let me see... Yeah, spick and span!'%K%P
'Heehee, how you like me now?'%K%P
Akane had her chest puffed out, more cheerful than\nshe'd been since giving up becoming an Idol.%K%P
Seeing her like that made me smile, too.%K%P
'Oh, and what's so funny, mister?!'%K%P
'Sorry, sorry. I'll take care of the rest of this,\nyou go ahead and take a break.'%K%P
'Woohoo, break time!\nUh... Huh?!'%K%P
'Huh? Akane!'%K%P
I grab Akane just as she starts to collapse.%K%P
'Th-Thanks...'%K%P
'Don't worry about it.\nAre you okay?\nWere you about to faint?'%K%P
I might have been imagining it, but she looked\npretty tired.%K%P
'I'm totally fine!\nI just tripped a bit.'%K%P
'Seriously? Sure you're not overdoing things?'%K%P
'Worry wart!\nBut anyway, you're being\nawfully forward, aren't you?'%K%P
'What's that supposed to mean?'%K%P
'You've got your hand on my butt.'%K%P
'Wah!'%K%P
Once she mentioned it...%K%P
The soft sensation under my hand,\nthe sweet scent she gave off,\nand her face being so close...%K%P
'Ahaha! Go on, grab away!'%K%P
'Who's grabbing?\nSeriously, you're so weird.'%K%P
'Wah!'%K%P
I pushed away from Akane's teasing.%K%P
'Sho...are you mad at me?'%K%P
'Why would I be mad?\nBut, I mean, I can't say it was\n100 percent accident.'%K%P
'Well, I don't mind at all.\nAnyway, I'm gonna watch TV.'%K%P
Akane started to run out.%K%P
'Right. When I'm done cleaning up here\nI'll bring tea and come watch with you.'%K%P
'Really? Okay, don't forget the snacks!\nAnd hurry it up.'%K%P
'Yeah, yeah.'%K%P
Watching Akane as she hurried out,\nher condition seemed just fine.%K%P
It looked like her problem just now really hadn't\nbeen anything serious.%K%P
'Okay, let's get this cleared away.'%K%P
I rolled up my sleeves and put away the dishes\nAkane had washed.%K%P
